name: deimosrising
text: It truly does suck the c0q

name: centipede_damascus
text: Vlad knows how to troll.

name: delzhand
text: Sounds like Little Nephew's blog.

name: madnes
text: i have had whoper

name: chaesar
text: How true, every message board always has some wank named after a Daedalus reference.

name: equinn2006
text: For Please sake. Seriously Pat.

name: johnnyrocker
text: "Oh for please sake" made me laugh out loud. Laughter on the second panel of a six-panel strip. Beat that, Garfield .

name: m3funkyb
text: I waited in mad anticipation for each strip of this particular story line

name: straw
text: Vlad's punctuation in the fifth panel is immense.

name: closefriend
text: One time I was playing Street Fighter and I lost to Zangief so badly he quoted panel 5 directly. Then he started to drop his speedo and, knowing what was next, I turned the TV off in shame.

name: josher
text: You made me giggle.

name: tekende
text: How do you know that Zangief's ass is bad?

name: hateandwar
text:
I saw that this comment has been sitting here for two weeks without anybody adding WHY FIND OUT after it, but the true answer is that Zangief's ass is bad because it's covered in scars and creature bites from fighting bears in the Siberian Wilderness.

I know a lot more about fictional fighting game strongmen than any reasonable person ought to.

name: zapatos
text: I thought everyone knew that.

name: featurelessvoid
text: I didn't notice it the first time I read this strip, but Pat's wildly inappropriate choice of soundtrack for his website is a nice detail.

name: pa_ass_nts
text: It always struck me as the sort of thing he would hate, though.

name: honesttom
text: Some of my all time favourite Achewoods are basically Onstad lampooning Internet users. THE DUDE HAS GOT NO MERCY.

name: nagsworth
text: It says 'Posts: 0' right next to his first post.

name: bixschmix
text: Of course. He created a profile just to flame the Subway page.

name: nagsworth
text: Yeah but what I'm saying is, he's made one post. Shouldn't it say 'Posts: 1' ?

name: bixschmix
text: He hasn't posted it yet; there's more vitriol yet to be dished out on www.patssubway.forum.com.

name: lahnnabell
text: A comment left by lahnnabell was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, goocifer, erinye, Darthemed)

name: biznart
text: I'm reasonably sure it's the "Brown Sugar" from the Stones (the Rolling ones).

name: conmansj
text: Vlad may be a dick, but you don't get to be the King of Make-Outs with kindness alone.

name: squid
text: Some things just shouldn't have forums.

name: deusoma
text: But if we didn't have tiny forums set out for the trolls to eat, then even more of them would come to Wikipedia.

name: tellumo
text: BURN!

name: cormanosanchez
text: It must be a MIDI of "brown sugar" or else it won't work.

name: soticoto
text: There is a distinct smell of lady-juice under Vlad's bridge.

name: clever-nickname
text: I like how Vlad's user rank on the forum is "6'' Veggie"

name: snowman
text: I know, totally.  I think this might be my favorite Vlad strip ever.

name: satellitetv
text: I saw that too and thought perhaps that was the default on the message board, like "Old female" on assetbar.

name: johnnytruant
text: if pat, a noted vegan, designed this forum, why is the veggie the lowest ranking of sandwich?

name: snowman
text: VLAD THINKS IN AN ACCENT.

name: heccibiggs
text: Well, don't you think in your own accent?

name: woodenteeth
text: Here we see Vlad tapping up Gladi8's inspiration.

name: troy_convers
text: Does the 'AUTHOR' details quote 6" Veggie? WTF!

name: troy_convers
text:
Sorry, didn't notice the 6" comment above mine.
I'll get me coat then.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I want Vlad to write my research proposal for me. I might get more money. Though I think its more likely I'll get thrown the fuck out of my job. It may be worth it though...........

name: zapatos
text: So this is where her name comes from.

name: biznart
text: I just noticed the Tab key has its own sound effect.  The mouse clicks, the other keys tap, but Tab doesn't mess around with traditional onomatopoeia.

name: greenkoolayd
text: is 'brown sugar' about getting some lovin' from a black lady, or is it about partaking of heroin?
